scripts.new: NODE_OPTIONS='-r tsconfig-paths/register' TS_NODE_PROJECT=docs/tsconfig.json tsx --tsconfig docs/tsconfig.json docs/src/scripts/createPage.ts
scripts.gen:page: NODE_OPTIONS='-r tsconfig-paths/register' TS_NODE_PROJECT=docs/tsconfig.json tsx --tsconfig docs/tsconfig.json docs/src/scripts/generatePages.ts
scripts.gen:link: NODE_OPTIONS='-r tsconfig-paths/register' TS_NODE_PROJECT=docs/tsconfig.json tsx --tsconfig docs/tsconfig.json docs/src/scripts/autoLinkPages.ts
